葫蘆.definition: calabash or bottle gourd (Lagenaria siceraria); hoist; generic term for block and tackle (or parts thereof); muddled; (poker) full house

葫蘆島.definition: see 葫蘆島市|葫芦岛市[Hu2lu2dao3 Shi4]

葫蘆島市.definition: Huludao, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

葫蘆絲.definition: hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)

葫蘆裡賣的是什麼藥.pinyin: hú lú lǐ mài de shì shén me yào
葫蘆裡賣的是什麼藥.definition: what has (he) got up (his) sleeve?; what's going on?
